text: Bob: Hey Adam! I have heard you talking to yourself!
Bob: So, you want to be an adventurer right? Did you know that every good adventurer needs a trusty weapon?
Bob: Maybe I can help you get one. I mean, what bad could happen if you get weapon to 8 year old.
Bob: Anyway, do you know the old guy who lives just down the road? He used to be a soldier. I bet he got a lot of weapons to give
Bob: Try bothering him, maybe he will give you some!
